Data Fields
pjmedia_vid_dev_switch_param Struct Reference
Video Device API » Video Device API Reference

Data Fields

pjmedia_vid_dev_index target_id
 

Detailed Description

Parameter for switching device with PJMEDIA_VID_DEV_CAP_SWITCH capability. Initialize this with pjmedia_vid_dev_switch_param_default()

Field Documentation

◆ target_id

pjmedia_vid_dev_index pjmedia_vid_dev_switch_param::target_id

Target device ID to switch to. Once the switching is successful, the video stream will use this device and the old device will be closed.
